channel.title: Adding list of teleports
channel.description:
How do I add a list of teleports when you click a teleport buton?
EXAMPLE:
(click varrock tele)
|where would you like to go?| | GodWars | | Tormented Demons | |_______________________|
And you could click one of the two and it would bring you to the specified coords. Using a PI base, 317 server.

item.title: Adding list of teleports
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:

say I wanted a coord to be 111,111
What would it look like?

item.title: Adding list of teleports
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:

How do I add a list of teleports when you click a teleport buton?

EXAMPLE:

(click varrock tele)

|where would you like to go?|
| GodWars |
| Tormented Demons |
|_______________________|

And you could click one of the two and it would bring you to the specified coords.
Using a PI base, 317 server.
